channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-7700] authorization api - HivePrivilegeObject for permanent function should have database name set
item.description: The HivePrivilegeObject for permanent function should have databasename set, and the functionname should be without the db part.
item.summary: authorization api - HivePrivilegeObject for permanent function should have database name set

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
